page.title: 05The local Policeman
page.content: {Foxtrot Bravo one three}was in the Navy when he decided, as he liked talking and getting to know people,he would join the police force.He lives in Gt.Shefford police house where he has an office as there is no police station.{He has a large patch which {includes twelve villages.}He drives about 70 miles a day.He either works from 8 a.m.to 4 p.m.or from 4 p.m.to 12 midnight.He has one break a day. He often goes home for a meal.If he sees someone breaking the law he arrests them. At times he radios for help. {He has caught 7 people this year.}He has never had to use his truncheon. Working near Newbury he has had some involvement with the Greenham Peace Women.{Earlier this year he spent 12 {weeks on duty on the picket lines of {the miners' dispute. After 10 years he {is still very happy in his job.
